title: COVID-19 In Japan
description: Welcome to our new blog, In this blog, we explore the different impact of COVID has resulted in Japan We hope you enjoy reading what we have to say!
contents:
Introduction
Covid- 19 is a disease caused by a form of coronavirus that can cause respiratory infections that can range from the common cold to more serious diseases.With its strong trasnmissiblity among public, it is true indeed to say that the COVID-19 pandemic has presented an unprecedent challenge to public health across the globe with a continue increase in the number of the people confirmed with the virus. Thus, to better understand the virus and its characteristic, we will be examining the the impact COVID-19 pandemic in Japan.
